column2: Allows internal data loading and public access to Elasticsearch.
You must select AT LEAST two (2) PUBLIC subnets for demo instance, ELB, Elasticsearch domain, and Lambda load functions to work.
Public IPs Kibana is accessible from.
Enter the VPC that the subnets belong to.
The public IP address that Kibana will be accessible from.
[{u'Action': u'es:*', u'Resource': u'*', u'Effect': u'Allow', u'Principal': {u'AWS': u'*'}}]
Please enter your SNS Topic Name. (SNS Topic must exist in the same region where this stack is launched).
[{u'ToPort': 80, u'FromPort': 80, u'IpProtocol': u'TCP', u'CidrIp': u'PublicCidr'}, {u'ToPort': 80, u'FromPort': 80, u'IpProtocol': u'TCP', u'CidrIp': u'CustomVpcCidr.Cidr'}]
